attributes.action: bring back Hollandia beer, for the students sake.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
bring back Hollandia beer to Asda stores.
Once upon a time there was a beer called Hollandia, which cost 90p for 4 cans. This beer was a pleasant, light, refreshing beer that students survived on for months on end. This beer is now gone.
BRING BACK HOLLANDIA

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
